IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.accept_quest') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.accept_quest GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.accept_quest @character_id dbo.id_t, @quest_code dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
INSERT INTO dbo.Accept_Quests(character_id, quest_code) VALUES(@character_id, @quest_code)
SET NOCOUNT OFF
